Assistant Security Executive -Operations ( 81487694 )

Company: Reliance Industries Limited
Location: Jamnagar, Gujarat, India
LinkedIn post
Job Responsibilities :

 Access control # men, material, information and vehicles

  • Check & deploy adequate manpower for managing access control & Property Protection in the zone/ Property Protection in the off-shore area / open sea static Security post.
  • Ensure checking of valid incoming/outgoing vehicles/men/material - on shore and off shore
  • Ensure logging of entry of vessels / ships in off shore / anchorage area.
  • Ensure logging of material transition to-n-from the zone.
  • Ensure Security of information repositories # IT hardware / record rooms etc.
  • Monitor traffic violations in the zone area.


Asset protection

  • Identification of critical infrastructure in zone.
  • Identification of critical infrastructure in offshore area like SPM / Control Room, berth etc.
  • Manage adequate Security measures for the critical infrastructure.
  • Ensure Security operations as per laid processes and procedures.
  • Deviation handling and management.
  • Ensure availability and up-keeping of Security infrastructure.


Situational awareness

  • Awareness about special INT inputs (internal team / own resources) to change the Security level.
  • Act on alarm raised from Security Control Room / Port Operation Centre.
  • Awareness about the movement/activities of other fishing and unauthorized boats in offshore area.


Governance Mechanism

  • Ensure and conduct daily briefing of Shift Security Supervisors / guards as per briefing schedule.
  • Ensure deployment of system-effectiveness validation mechanism # special checks / inputs from other functionaries etc.


Education Requirement :

 Necessary :

  • Graduate/ Army Graduate
  • Or NCC "B" Certificate


Desirable :

  • Graduate - Any disciple
  • NCC - "C" Certificate (optional)
  • LLB/LLMor knowledge of Land of law-Criminal, IR and labour la
  • VIP Protection Courses - RGSS/ SPG/ NSG / Defence Services. ISPS / Port Security Protection Course/ Maritime Facility Security Course.


Experience Requirement :

 Necessary

  • 10 to 20 Yrs Service in Armed Forces / Para Military Force / Police


Desirable

  • 0 to 3 Yrs experiences in Security functions.


Knowledge of Security Automation # Usage / technical functions.

Skills & Competencies :

  • Should be through in site knowledge (topography and layout) and key capabilities of the team to extract desired results.
  • Pro-active approach in dealing with exceptions / odd-situations.
  • Must be resourceful, in depth knowledge about the Security documentation / processes & procedures.
  • Should posses# adequate knowledge of marine security and tolerance when deployed /posted for maritime facilities protection assignment.
  • At GSOC/SOC- knowledge of Security automation system and technology, able to work at console tirelessly, ability to observe minute incident and react promptly.
  • Withstand and adequate courage to protect key personnel when deployed for personal protection. Knowledge of small weapons and possession of weapon License will be desirable.
  • All the job profiles are publicly listed on recruitment platforms
